channel.title: Release Notes - 2015 on Releases - aspose.com
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2015 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.Words for JasperReports 2.4.0 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Words for JasperReports 2.4.0 Please welcome a new release of Aspose.Words for JasperReports. It includes support of newest JasperReports Server 6.1.1 and a number of bug fixes. Starting from release 1.9.0 there are several versions of jar library (necessary for better support of older versions of JasperReports): for JasperReports 5.6.0 … 6.1.1 (aspose.words.jasperreports-6.1.1.jar) for JasperReports 4.7.0 … 5.5.0 (aspose.words.jasperreports-5.5.0.jar) for JasperReports 3.

item.title: Aspose.Words for JasperReports 2.3.0 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Words for JasperReports 2.3.0 Please welcome a new release of Aspose.Words for JasperReports. Starting from release 1.9.0 there are several versions of jar library (necessary for better support of older versions of JasperReports): for JasperReports 5.6.0 … 6.0.1 (aspose.words.jasperreports-6.0.1.jar) for JasperReports 4.7.0 … 5.5.0 (aspose.words.jasperreports-5.5.0.jar) for JasperReports 3.7.2 … 4.5.0 (aspose.words.jasperreports-4.5.0.jar) for JasperReports 3.7.1 and lower (aspose.words.jasperreports-3.7.1.jar) Please copy jar library according to the version of installed JasperReports.

item.title: Aspose.Words for JasperReports 2.2.0 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for [ Aspose.Words for JasperReports 2.2.0|https://downloads.aspose.com/words/jasperreports/new-releases/-aspose.words-for-jasperreports-2.2.0/] Please welcome a new release of Aspose.Words for JasperReports. This release includes support of JasperReports 5.6.x and 6.0.x as major update. Starting from release 1.9.0 there are several versions of jar library (necessary for better support of older versions of JasperReports): for JasperReports 5.6.0 … 6.0.1 (aspose.words.jasperreports-6.0.1.jar) for JasperReports 4.7.0 … 5.5.0 (aspose.words.jasperreports-5.5.0.jar) for JasperReports 3.7.2 … 4.
